segments.text: I see the kitchen with its open cabinets and dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is focused on the plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that faucet is running wild, water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is gross, all wet and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in it, ugh, she must feel that soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is tilting, cookies in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching into the jar like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the whole setup is so messy with the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl just standing there, adding to the disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets dripping wet, what a filthy sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is clean, unlike this slop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how untidy it all is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean this up fast.
segments.speaker: PAR
